Me siento conmovido ante el compromiso de @tiadb hoy con el pueblo venezolano cuando se unió a la esposa de @GovRonDeSantis  Casey en una mesa redonda con miembros de la comunidad venezolana. Sigo apoyando la democracia y la libertad para el país de Venezuela. #TeamMario https://t.co/EUJKiu1b4W

The stories heard today over the round table with @GovRonDeSantis’ wife @FLCaseyDeSantis @LtGovNunez  @SenRubioPress’ wife Jeanette and @tiadb were very powerful and emotional. I continue my support for democracy and freedom for Venezuela! #Venezuela #Venezuelan ##Democracy https://t.co/RvAAjtLVP9

I am humbled by @tiadb’s commitment to the #Venezuelan people today as she joined @GovRonDeSantis’ wife @FLCaseyDeSantis in a round table with members of the Venezuela community.  I continue to support #democracy and freedom for the country of Venezuela. #Venezuela #Libertad https://t.co/nSxrvZywsG
